title: A treatise entitled the path waye to the towre of perfection. Compiled by Myles Huggarde, seruant to the Quenes most excellent maiestie
author: Huggarde, Miles.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Robert Caly within the precinct of the late dissolued house of the graye Freers, nowe conuerted to an hospital called Christes hospital,
